sentences.english: Longitudinalcheng he solid throughout, folding fighting snake river, tortuous.
sentences.chinese: 固城河縱貫全境，河道斗折蛇行，迂迴曲折。

sentences.english: The road snakes (its way) through the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 那條路斗折蛇行穿過羣山。

sentences.english: Maria implored her husband to get away from the weaving car.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗婭哀求丈夫，趕緊躲開那輛還在左右蛇行的車。

sentences.english: After fifteen minutes of figure eights, i rode home.
sentences.chinese: 騎車蛇行十五分鐘後，我終於回到家。

sentences.english: You practices-curves on the freeway at 120.
sentences.chinese: 你在高速公路上以120公里時速蛇行。

sentences.english: The hunting stability of the passenger car with CRB is also studied in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 本文還研究了可控徑向轉向架客車的蛇行運動穩定性。
